form.title: nf-core/rnafusion
form.description: A workflow for detecting and visualizing gene fusion events in RNA sequencing datasets.

workflow_version.title: Workflow Version
workflow_version.description: Select the specific version of nf-core/rnafusion to use

ref_genome.title: Reference Genome
ref_genome.description: The workflow is currently configured to work with GRCh38 (ENSEMBL v102).

tool_selection.title: Fusion detection tools
tool_selection.description: Please select one or more fusion detection tools for your analysis. Reports are recommended for viewing outputs - Fusion-Inspector will work on the outputs of any fusion detection tool used.

tools.title: Analysis Tools
tools.description: Please select one or more fusion detection tools for your analysis.

reports.title: Report generation
reports.help: N.B: This can be run on all fusion-detection tool outputs.

trimming.title: Read Trimming
trimming.description: Read trimming is performed using reformat.sh from BBMAP. Currently, there is no option to alter the parameters used.

max_memory.title: Maximum Memory
max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory to allocate for the job (e.g., 8.GB, 16.GB).

max_cpus.title: Maximum CPUs
max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs to allocate for the job.
